meta.article_title: November 2, 2020 - Backhand Chopping in an Emergency

terminologie_extrait.definition: a shot where the ball is grazed with a mostly downward stroke
terminologie_extrait.contexte: used to rescue out of an impossible position when quick-hit from forehand side

backhand_chopping_in_an_emergency.probleme: Stuck out of position away from the table on forehand side, quick-hit to wide backhand

debutant.probleme: Let ball drop to table level or below
debutant.solution: Contact ball more toward back with racket facing forward, graze ball with mostly downward stroke

exercices_complementaires.description: Let the ball drop to table level or below; contact more toward back with racket facing forward, graze ball with mostly downward stroke

metriques_progression: Let the ball float long after chopping
erreurs_a_eviter: Chopping too much under the ball, popping it up
